text: B2N (born 20 December 1987) often known as B2N is an Albanian singer and record producer. == Life == Blerim Mekrezvani was born on 20 December 1987 in Tirana to an Albanian Orthodox family. == Discography == * 2008 – "Si Cunami" (Tsunami) * 2009 – "Perfeksion" (Perfection) * 2009 – "Reklama" (Advertisement) * 2011 – "E Pamundur" (The Impossible) * 2013 – "Melodi" (Melody) * 2014 – "Kalle Zemer" * 2014 – "Ai Djali" (That boy) * 2014 – "Nuse" (Bride) * 2013 – "A Te Kujtohem Un" (Do you remember me) * 2015 – "Nuse 2" (Bride 2) * 2016 – "Per pushime" (For vacation) * 2016 - "Ke me met beqare" * 2016 - "Te dua Shqiperi" * 2016 - "A m'don Hala" == References == Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Musicians from Tirana Category:Albanian male singers
title: B2N
